title: Fail to import a definition file with missing DisplayOrder in AccessTypeRoles when Display is set to True
specs: contains a definition file with new tab AccessTypeRoles missing DisplayOrder when Display is set to True

body.__plainTextValue__: Validation errors occurred importing the spreadsheet.- 'DisplayOrder' should not be null or empty for 'Display' to be used in column 'DisplayOrder' in the sheet 'AccessTypeRoles'
